name: Dead Heroes Don't Cry
description:
Move with the arrow keys. Embrace death.

Press R or backspace to retry a level.

Made in three days for Minijam 72. The theme was "Adventure" and the limitation was "death must be a core mechanic".

Post-jam updates:

  • Added quality settings as the game was lagging quite heavily on low-end laptops
  • Optimized blood rendering

Credits:

  • Font: Quicksand by Andrew Paglinawan
  • Death sound: Agaxly
  • Win sound: Écrivain
  • Music by Tri-Tachyon - https://soundcloud.com/tri-tachyon/albums

All other assets made by me during the jam.
